@Pat Taylor @Amol Vyas There is an invariant on the CareTeam element "EOB-prof-careTeam-organization" that says "Professional EOB: Careteam roles refer to an organization
: ( role.where(coding.where(code in ('site')).exists()).exists() implies role.where(coding.where(code in ('site' )).exists()).exists().provider.all(resolve() is Organization) )". The code 'site' does not exist in the required Value Set for CareTeam.role (C4BB Claim Professional And Non Clinician Care Team Role (required)) is there any guidance on this? Is there another ValueSet for 'site' that I am missing?

@Caitlin Ryan , you are not missing anything. This appears to be an error in the Implementation Guide. I have raised the issue with the IG team. We will discuss how to resolve it. Thanks for bringing it to our attention. I have added the issue to Jira - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-31658

@Caitlin Ryan Yes, the invariant is incorrect. 'Site' is not a valid code for the CareTeam.role Value Set. The service facility on a professional claim is mapped to Organization in the servicefacility slice. @Corey Spears @Amol Vyas
